name: Hazy Islands
description:
Hazy Islands

After a disastrous storm, you find yourself marooned on an unknown island.
You must gather food, set up a camp and start foraging for more resources.

Your only hope to escape is to signal passing ships using signs and bonfires.

Meanwhile, the wildlife seems to be growing ever more hostile with each passing day, and strange messages from another survivor seem to be hinting at mysterious powers that inhabit the island...

Personal note

Hazy Islands is my pet project i developed in my spare time.
Even though i am pretty happy with how it turned out so far, it still serves as an example for "biting off more than you can chew", and likely won't be developed further.
However, i decided to put it up here to play for free, instead of having it hidden away and forgotten in never to be touched again backups.
Have fun playing! :)
